blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: The Bottom of Empty
description:
by Angelkissesanddemonsblood

Izuku had never thought he’d be kidnapped by the League of Villains, less that it would take his partners over a month to find him when he was. The cost of the time it took is Izuku himself, who, tortured, broken and with irreversible scars has to traverse the pain of experiencing debilitating PTSD.
While caring for him Katsuki must learn to remain calm and quiet, only touch when asked to touch, and support Izuku even on his darkest days. Meanwhile, Shouto must come to terms with the fact that he is a source of pain for Izuku, looking far to similar to the man that took all of Izuku’s light.

Words: 522, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Touya, Todoroki Dabi - Character, Other BNHA Characters
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, TodoBakuDeku
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Angst, Trigger Warnings, Graphic depictions of violence - Freeform, Mental Illness, PTSD

title: The Bottom of Empty
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2YmQbyM

by Angelkissesanddemonsblood

Izuku had never thought he’d be kidnapped by the League of Villains, less that it would take his partners over a month to find him when he was. The cost of the time it took is Izuku himself, who, tortured, broken and with irreversible scars has to traverse the pain of experiencing debilitating PTSD.
While caring for him Katsuki must learn to remain calm and quiet, only touch when asked to touch, and support Izuku even on his darkest days. Meanwhile, Shouto must come to terms with the fact that he is a source of pain for Izuku, looking far to similar to the man that took all of Izuku’s light.

summary: You wanna be friends forever? I can think of something better - Tori10 - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia...
title: You wanna be friends forever? I can think of something better - Tori10 - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
She wasn’t… she wasn’t ashamed of her crush on the other girl! Far from it! She loved the feelings Kyouka inspired in her! She loved the feeling of rightness. Of knowing that Kyouka had her back just like she had hers. She loved that she knew the other girl so well, that they shared almost all of their secrets.

Valentine’s Day is approaching, and Yaoyorozu Momo has a plan.

(Todoroki is dragged along for the ride, because she’s sick of his pining over Midoriya.)

HAPPY BIRTHDAY @kingtodoroki!!!!!!!!!!!

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Eri, Iida Tensei, Togata Mirio, Yagi Toshinori Warnings: none as of yet? implied past...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Eri, Iida Tensei, Togata Mirio, Yagi Toshinori
Warnings: none as of yet? implied past violence, maybe

Prompt: Eri learns to control her quirk. Iida Tensei gets rewound and gets to be Ingenium again. Togata Mirio gets his quirk back. And maybe Yagi Toshinori regains some organs (but not the quirk, that’s long gone).

- kunnskat on AO3
